description: GREAT TOWNHOUSE OPPORTUNITY! For investors, entrepreneurs or a family with their own business next to their home! For entrepreneurial people where they can enjoy a home and work without having to travel, carrying out the activity or work that adapts to their situation. Navas del Rey municipality of Madrid, a town with charm and tourism, where the Torreon, Kuna Iberica faaunan center, Museo del Guardia, Environmental Education Center, Bunker Colmenar del Arroyo, Safari, Wineries and Vineyard and much more are located.. . Navas del Rey has shops, bars, restaurants, squares, parks, schools, sports institutes and more, as well as access to it via the M-507, M-530 and M-501. It has a Metro line and bus service.

You will like to know: · We do not charge the buyer. · Magnificent independent 2-story villa located in the El Club Urbanization, in Navas del Rey. · It has a constructed area of 261 m2, on a 650 m2 plot. · It faces east, which makes it very bright. · Ground floor: hall, large living-dining room with 3 windows and fireplace, bedroom, pantry or closed closet in the hallway, full bathroom with hydromassage shower and a large kitchen furnished with pantry, 2 windows and door with access to the garden. · Second floor: 4 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms (two with a bathtub and one with a shower), and a closet or storage room in the hallway. The main room has an attic, as well as the bathroom it has. · Oak interior carpentry and double glazed windows. · Large garage with a 1000 liter diesel boiler. · On the plot there is a 25 cubic meter Zodiac nylon canvas swimming pool, barbecue area and construction shed for tools. · Rental option with the right to purchase. Check with the agent. It is special because: · Navas del Rey is located in the southwest of the Community of Madrid, in the region of the Alberche river basin, in a transition area between the Sierra de Guadarrama and the Sierra de Gredos, making it an ideal area for hiking. , Mountain bike… · It is bathed by various streams and the Cofio River that flows into the San Juan Reservoir, which is a 5-minute drive away. The environment is ideal to relax and forget about daily stress. · The Club and El Morro urbanizations have a reservoir with a swimming area and a bus stop. · Very well connected by road (3 minutes by car from Pelayos de la Presa and 5 minutes from Navas del Rey). · 200 meters from the house you will find a calisthenics training park and bio-healthy equipment to exercise outdoors. · In the town you have all the necessary services: shops, health center, restaurants, etc. , as well as a heliport in case of emergency that is located near the minigolf and the sports center. · Don't hesitate and come see the area and this wonderful house, which you can see on the virtual tour.

description: GreenLife Inmobiliaria S.L.FOR SALE: Semi-detached house located in a residential area of Navas del Rey.Built in 2002, it has dimensions of 196m² built on two floors, built on a graphic parcel area of 504m². In its municipal area there are plant and animal species of ecological value.As it is a nava, that is, a flat land without trees, it has few forests of oaks or pines, most of which are located on the banks of the Picadas reservoir and depending on how we approach Pelayos de la Presa or Robledo de Chavela.It has a small pine forest on the outskirts of the town, called La Pinarilla, intended to satisfy the wood needs of the town.Beyond La Pinarilla lie uncultivated fields, brooms and rockroses. Make this semi-detached house your new home in Navas del Rey! WE HAVE A FINANCIAL DEPARTMENT, which offers ADVICE WITHOUT COMMITMENT OR COST To study your real CREDITS/FINANCING capacity.Our Advisors provide all the guarantees in the purchase and sale with financing. **NON-BINDING ANNOUNCEMENT, FOR INFORMATIONAL AND NON-CONTRACTUAL PURPOSES**.

description: Welcome to natural paradise! We present this beautiful little house for sale located in the quiet San Juan neighborhood, next to the beaches of the reservoir. Can you imagine living surrounded by nature all year round? This is your chance! The property has a large 70-meter patio, ideal for enjoying the views and doing outdoor activities. In addition, it has a living room, a bedroom with built-in wardrobes, a kitchen and a bathroom with a shower. What else do you need? If you are looking for an investment, this little house also has the possibility of obtaining a tourist license and is perfect for rent on airBNB. The location can't be beat! The natural environment offers you the opportunity to do water activities in the reservoir, as well as practice sports such as hiking, cycling... In addition, it is only 60 km from Madrid (40 min. ), making it an ideal place to escape the city on weekends. The closest town is Pelayos de la Presa, just 2 km away, where you will find everything you need for your daily life. If you are looking for more shopping options, San Martín de Valdeiglesias is just 10 km away. Don't miss the opportunity to live in a place surrounded by trees and with nearby places of interest such as the San Juan Reservoir, the Coracera Castle, the Botanical Garden, the Church and the hermitages, and the Guisando Bulls. Come visit it and fall in love with this natural paradise!

The kitchen is fully furnished, as well as equipped with an oven, hob, extractor and water heater. Likewise, the bathroom is fully equipped, four pieces and with a bathtub. Residential, quiet area. Just 3 km. from Navas del Rey, where all kinds of shops, services, administrations, schools and the connection with the M-501 highway are located. 2 km away. of the Alberche River, where it has a picnic area and several viewpoints. Call now for more information about the home and to arrange a visit. MAXIMUM FINANCING POSSIBILITY!

description: SPECTACULAR VILLA IN NAVAS DEL REY Tizona Group offers this semi-detached house for sale located in one of the most sought-after towns in the southwest mountains of Madrid. In short, an area where you will forget about the stress of the big city and breathe fresh air, just 25 minutes from Móstoles and Alcorcón and with very quick access to the M-501 highway. The interior of the house has 100m2 inside, distributed over two floors: The first of them has a spacious and bright independent living room which provides a lot of privacy. It also has a large, square kitchen where you can make life in it. Finally, this first floor also has a nice toilet. On the second floor we find three large, bright and square rooms, which means that the space can be used to the maximum. All of them have built-in wardrobes, which are a perfect relief. A large full bathroom with a bathtub and window which provides ventilation. This chalet has an entrance patio, a wonderful garage which you can also use as a storage room since you have space for it and the jewel in the crown is the spectacular garden at the back of the house, which I am sure you will fall in love with. It is perfect to enjoy in spring and summer and you also have the possibility of adding a pool. I am Miguel, an advisor for the area and I will be happy to show you what will be your future home. Don't think twice and contact me to arrange a visit. Our intermediation fees are included in the sale price and we have a financial group with the possibility of 100% financing.
